description: A Bound subdivided in horizontal and vertical stripes

funcs.description: Determines the number of stripes by frequency, and change method to frequency
funcs.name: setFrequency

funcs.description: Set number of strips by number, and change method to stripes
funcs.name: setStripes

funcs.description: create a masking area for canvas clipping. Defaults to position in the center of the bound, unless anchor paramater is set
funcs.name: setMask
param: anchor optional anchor point, or leave unset to default anchor position which is center of the bound.
